ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.2_0: the monks from the group of six intentionally made the monks from the group of seventeen anxious. They said,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.3_0: “The Buddha has laid down a training rule
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.4_0: that a person less than twenty years old shouldn’t be given the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.5_0: And you were less than twenty when you got the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.6_0: Could it be that you’re not fully ordained?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.8_0: When other monks asked him why,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.10_0: and they said, “The monks from the group of six intentionally make us anxious.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.11_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.12_0: “How can the monks from the group of six do this?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.13_0: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.16_0: “... Foolish men, how can you do this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.17_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.18_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.19.1_0: ‘If a monk intentionally makes a monk anxious, thinking, “In this way he will be ill at ease at least for a moment,” and he does so only for this reason and no other, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.1.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.1.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.1.8_0: knowing, perceiving, having intended, having decided, she transgresses.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.1.10_0: if he makes him anxious, saying, “It would seem that you were less than twenty years old when you were given the full ordination,” “It would seem that you have eaten at the wrong time,” “It would seem that you have drunk alcohol,” “It would seem that you have been sitting in private with a woman,” he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.1.11_0: He does so only for this reason and no other:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.1.12_0: there is no other reason for making him anxious.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.1_0: If it is one who is fully ordained, and he perceives him as such, and he intentionally makes him anxious, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.2_0: If it is one who is fully ordained, but he is unsure of it, and he intentionally makes him anxious, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.3_0: If it is one who is fully ordained, but he does not perceive him as such, and he intentionally makes him anxious, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.4_0: If he intentionally makes one who is not fully ordained anxious, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.5_0: If the one who corrects him is not fully ordained, but he perceives him as such, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.6_0: If the one who corrects him is not fully ordained, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.7_0: If it is to one who is not fully ordained, and he does not perceive them as such, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.3.2_0: if, not wanting to make him anxious, he says, “It would seem that you were less than twenty years old when you were given the full ordination,” “It would seem that you have eaten at the wrong time,” “It would seem that you have drunk alcohol,” “It would seem that you have been sitting in private with a woman,” and then “Find out about it, so that you don’t get anxious later;”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.3.5_0: The seventh rule, the training rule on intentionally, is finished.
